name: Wilton Buttercream-use for Granny's cookies
steps: Pure white frosting: Omit butter and add 1/2 vegetable shortening and 1/2 tsp butter extract and use clear vanilla extract.
Chocolate Frosting: Add 3/4 c. unsweetened chocolate (cocoa) or 3 oz. meted unsweetened chocolate squares plus 2 Tbsp milk.
To stiffen icing: chill frosting or add more powdered sugar
To thin icing: add 2 Tbsp milk or Tbsp corn syrup
